<title level="1" right="Trait">[Troop](/Traits.aspx?ID=849)</title>

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 238

A troop is an organized collection of component creatures, typically Small or Medium in size, working as a cohesive whole. Over the course of enough attacks and downed comrades, troops shrink in size. A troop typically has the [troop defenses](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=86) and [troop movement](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=85) abilities, and most troops have weaknesses to area damage and splash damage. Because they consist of multiple discrete creatures, they can't be summoned.
